name: In re Adoption of Christopher Westcott NORWINE, II

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and MANDERINO, JJ.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re Adoption of Christopher Westcott NORWINE, II.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David E. Auerbach, Media, for appellant.
Joel S. Robbins, Brookhaven, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
378 A.2d 835
In re Adoption of Christopher Westcott NORWINE, II.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 11, 1976.
Decided Oct. 7, 1977.
David E. Auerbach, Media, for appellant.
Joel S. Robbins, Brookhaven, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and MANDERINO, JJ.
